item.title: Decrypt gpg data in salt masterless
item.description: You must copy gpgkeys from salt master to masterless minion If you encrypt data with gpg in salt master. If gpgkeys is located in /etc/salt/gpgkeys/ in the salt master(default), you need to copy it to the same path(default) or some place you defined by config file in the masterless minion. root@salt-master:~# ll /etc/salt/gpgkeys/ total 28 drwx------ 2 root root 4096 Sep 4 2015 ./ drwxr-xr-x 9 root root 4096 Jun 22 23:31 .
